Get the latest in style & beauty from your favorite YouTube personalities. Check out the demo video to see how we’re changing the shopping experience. 
 
How it works:
•	Download the Shoptellie chrome extension and use it to shop your favorite YouTube channels. 
•	The closet automatically appears and loads when you view a partner video. 
•	Save the items you love, across videos, so you can check them out later or purchase them with a click.

To request new channels you’d like us to work with – or to just tell us what you think – email us at help@shoptellie.com.

Disclaimer:
We sometimes use specially formatted links for which we receive a commission on resulting sales or clicks from affiliate partners (“Affiliate Links”)
